DOC.detailed_description: It generally case small corneal cataract surgical incision associate rapid wound healing , stable corneal biomechanical property less surgically induced astigmatism ( SIA ) . With development phacoemulsification foldable intraocular lens ( IOL ) recent decade , size clear corneal incision reduce 3.2-mm ( coaxial small incision ) 1.4-mm ( bimanual micro incision ) . However , superiority coaxial micro incision cataract surgery compare conventional coaxial cataract surgery still certain , micro incision phacoemulsification may result long ultrasound time ( UST ) , use ultrasonic power consequently higher endothelial cell loss ( ECL ) .
